Stéphane HERBIN

Senior researcher at ONERA, Department of Information Processing and Systems.

ONERA / DTIS

Chemin de la Hunière

BP 80100

91123 Palaiseau Cedex

France

ph: +33 1 80 38 65 69

My research adresses mainly the design of models and algorithms for data interpretation, i.e. the production and manipulation of semantic representations, with a focus on images and videos.

Keywords

  • Computer vision
  • Machine learning
  • Language & vision
  • Aerospace data (remote sensing, video from drone)

news

Jan 15, 2021 Alexis Lechat will present his work: “Semi-Supervised Class Incremental Learning” at the ICPR 2020 conference.
Oct 22, 2020 The last issue of the Aerospace Lab Journal I coordinated with Jean-Loup Farges is on line. See also the article about Challenges in the Certification of Computer Vision-Based Systems for Civil Aeronautics.
Jul 6, 2020 I defended my “Habilitation à Diriger des Recherches” untitled “Towards Autonomous Perceptual Systems” on Monday, July 6th, 2020. Slides and Memoire.
